article.headline: Niagara 83, Marist 75
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. (AP) -- Charron Fisher scored 33 points and had 9 rebounds to lead Niagara in an 83-75 win over Marist Friday night. Lorenzo Miles scored 15 points for Niagara (11-10, 6-4) and Clif Brown grabbed 11 rebounds. Jared Jordan led Marist (15-6, 7-3) with 31 points, while Ryan Stilphen added 20. Marist cut the Niagara lead to five points, 77-72, when Will Whittington sank two free throws with 31 seconds left. Niagara followed up to sink six of eight free throws for the win. The Purple Eagles opened with an 11-4 run when three of its first four shots were three-pointers. Marist came back to take an 18-16 lead when Jordan capped a 12-5 run with a layup. Niagara responded with an 11-4 run to take a 27-22 lead on a Fisher three-pointer with less than five minutes left in the first half. Niagara outrebounded Marist 39-29.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
